name: motion: a
description:
Made for LD35: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=39935

Drag the shape towards any cardinal direction to start.

This is an interactive sculpture, really just a toy. Sound is a huge part of the experience so don't play it deaf if you can help it.

Music created with LSDJ on a Gameboy Color.

Works great on mobile! Definitely hit that fullscreen button. Here's a more accessible link for mobile play: jabdownsmash.com/motiona
